CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Task (
  id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  projectId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  taskType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  status INT NOT NULL,
  startTime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  endTime TIMESTAMP NULL,
  completedCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  modelInfo TEXT NOT NULL,
  language VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'zh-CN',
  detail TEXT DEFAULT '',
  note TEXT DEFAULT '',
  createAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updateAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  FOREIGN KEY (projectId) REFERENCES Projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE INDEX idx_task_projectId ON Task(projectId);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS GaPairs (
 id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 projectId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 fileId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 pairNumber INT NOT NULL,
 genreTitle VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 genreDesc TEXT NOT NULL,
 audienceTitle VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 audienceDesc TEXT NOT NULL,
 isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
 createAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
 updateAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
 PRIMARY KEY (id),
 FOREIGN KEY (projectId) REFERENCES Projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
 FOREIGN KEY (fileId) REFERENCES UploadFiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
 UNIQUE (fileId, pairNumber)
);

CREATE INDEX idx_gapairs_projectId ON GaPairs(projectId);
CREATE INDEX idx_gapairs_fileId ON GaPairs(fileId);
ALTER TABLE Questions ADD COLUMN gaPairId VARCHAR(255) NULL;

ALTER TABLE Questions ADD FOREIGN KEY (gaPairId) REFERENCES GaPairs(id) ON DELETE SET NULL;

CREATE INDEX idx_questions_gaPairId ON Questions(gaPairId);
